reviewDescription: The soundbar is worth its price. The design is elegant, buttons are clicky, no connectivity issues. RGB is a good addon. You can also change rgb modes.Sound is crisp and clear. Bass is not overpowering and is good. No distortion at max volume either.Satisfied with the purchase

*pros* :sound quality-decent with sufficient bass with clear mids and highs.good for movies,youtube lectures :volume-sufficient for small room,I use it as pc speaker :build quality-its made of good quality plastic..and a metal grill at front..imean, it's Good according to price:battery &charging-i get around 7hrs backup with RGB off and it takes 2hrs to charge*Cons*:Switching off RGB-am not a fan of RGB and also to reduce battery consumption...but switching off RGB takes a lot of time since we have to press and hold through all RGB modes and at last we get RGB off mode..instead they should have given RGB off at first press and hold:turn on sound-maybe subjective but it's a high frequency sound when turned on...which makes it inconvenient to switch on at night..instead they should have given  just a small beep sound just to notify it's turned onThatsit... overall a nice product for the price (I got it at 1.5k): : :

reviewTitle: The minimalist aesthetic blends seamlessly with most living room setups
reviewDescription: If you're looking to elevate your audio experience at home, the Soundbar is an exceptional choice that combines power, clarity, and ease of use, all at an affordable price point.Value for Money:The Soundbar delivers incredible value for its price. With its high-quality sound, easy installation, and thoughtful features, it outperforms many soundbars in its class.     ¬†I am really liking it. First of all 1499rs is like nothing and with this much money you'll be getting a cool looking soundbar which is well balanced and sturdily built with somewhat premium finish. Buttons are very well defined and tactical. That little on/off button is so good and the moment you switch it on, it'll be paired with ease.Sound quality is great and clear with melodious mids and highs. Bass is just average but keep it in mind that expecting bass from this little soundbar is injustice itself. Even at 80-90% volume the sound never distorted. Overall very good experience and I'll buy another one for TWS feature and I'm sure it won't disappoint.Edit: Battery life is very disappointing and it'll ruin the wireless experience within 2-3hrs at 70-80% volume. I've to keep it stationary near TV or desktop for usb wired power supply

I recently purchased the Crossbeats speaker, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. The sound quality is clear, with deep bass and crisp highs, making it perfect for music, movies, or podcasts. The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless and quick, with no dropouts even at a reasonable distance.The build quality feels premium, and the compact design makes it easy to carry around. Battery life is also excellent ‚Äì it easily lasted me a full day of use on a single charge.Overall, this speaker is great value for money, offering excellent performance for the price. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable and stylish Bluetooth speaker!

reviewTitle: "Crossbeat Blaze B24: Stylish Design with Decent Sound Clarity"
reviewDescription: The Crossbeat Blaze B24 stands out with its sleek design and vibrant RGB lights, giving it a cool, gamer-centric aesthetic. The sound clarity is impressive, delivering crisp audio for casual listening or gaming. However, the volume could be a bit louder, which might be a downside for those who prefer higher sound levels. Overall, it's a good budget option for users looking for style and decent audio performance.

reviewTitle: A decent and affordable soundbar with cool RGB and melodious sound
reviewDescription: I am really liking it. First of all 1499rs is like nothing and with this much money you'll be getting a cool looking soundbar which is well balanced and sturdily built with somewhat premium finish. Buttons are very well defined and tactical. That little on/off button is so good and the moment you switch it on, it'll be paired with ease.Sound quality is great and clear with melodious mids and highs. Bass is just average but keep it in mind that expecting bass from this little soundbar is injustice itself. Even at 80-90% volume the sound never distorted. Overall very good experience and I'll buy another one for TWS feature and I'm sure it won't disappoint.Edit: Battery life is very disappointing and it'll ruin the wireless experience within 2-3hrs at 70-80% volume. I've to keep it stationary near TV or desktop for usb wired power supply. So 1 star minus from original 4.5 star rating.3.5/5 stars

Its battery is very bad ...even i turn off the RGB lights, still it is not extending more than half hours! And it doesn't get charged while the speaker is onIt gets turned off!I don't know but its very disappoint otherwise everything is okay except battery

Its sleek design and multiple connectivity options make it a versatile addition to any setup, whether you're streaming movies, playing games, or listening to music. With its powerful audio and customizable features, the Blaze 24 is sure to captivate your senses and take your audio enjoyment to the next level.
